text: [Applause]
$25 billion that's how much the United
States spends on HIV just domestically
every single year now wouldn't it be
awesome if we had a vaccine to this
disease we actually have something
that's pretty darn close prep is a
medication that is 99% effective at
preventing HIV but there's a catch you
have to take the pill every single day
now who here has tried to take a daily
medication it's not that easy right
that's where your sure comes in we drive
adherence to prep by making urine tests
that allow doctors to see whether or not
their patients are actually taking the
medication we have a team that brings
business clinical and Technical
expertise as well as a passion for
preventing HIV in high-risk populations
to this important issue in our HIV
preventive program in Philadelphia we
have boosted prep adherence to twice the
national average through our urine test
higher prep adherence means lower HIV
infections so I want you to imagine our
patients they have two options for how
they get tested for their prep adherance
they can either get a needle to the arm
or they can pee in a cup guess what they
prefer the urine test our tests are
noninvasive and they're painless they're
also cheaper than the blood test and
they produce rapid results while the
blood test takes several days so
remember preventing HIV it's as easy as
one 2 p thank you
[Applause]
wo
